name: Tapestry: Psyche at Cupid's Palace
maker: After cartoon by François Boucher, and woven under the direction of Nicolas Besnier, and Jean-Baptiste Oudry, et al
description: Tapestry: Psyche at Cupid's Palace; After cartoon by François Boucher (French, 1703 - 1770), and woven under the direction of Nicolas Besnier (French, 1714 - 1754), and Jean-Baptiste Oudry (French, 1686 - 1755), et al; Beauvais, France; about 1741 - 1742; Silk and wool; 332.7 x 568.4 cm (131 x 223 3/4 in.); 63.DD.5; Gift of J. Paul Getty; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
